items.summary: Update the backend email sending logic to use the new HTML templates when sending notifications to customers (project status updates, project confirmations). Use simple plain-text formatting for admin notifications (new projects, new comments) without logo or signature.

Create professional HTML email templates for all outgoing customer notifications. Structure emails with clear sections: greeting, content formatted in list form for clarity, and a signature section (only for customer emails) that visually displays the Nebadon Encryption logo and a clickable link to nencrypt.com. Ensure templates are responsive and include plain-text fallback versions.
